name: GEDI Cal/Val Field Data
info: Plot locations from the Global Ecosystem Dynamics Investigation (GEDI) Forest Structure and Biomass Database (FSBD). The database is a collection of field and LiDAR datasets developed to serve a central repository for calibration and validation of the GEDI mission data. The GEDI Cal/Val Field Data collection contains the field data contributions to the FSBD. The database has contributions across the globe for a variety of vegetation types from projects dating back to 2003.
